clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the local treatment of vulvovaginal candidiasis moniliasis

contraindications.disease: Symptoms of overdose include erythema stinging blistering peeling edema pruritus urticaria burning and general irritation of the skin and cramps
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Tioconazole is a broad spectrum imidazole antifungal agent that inhibits the growth of human pathogenic yeasts Tioconazole exhibits fungicidal activity in vitro against i Candida albicans i other species of the genus Candida and against i Torulopsis glabrata i Tioconazole prevents the growth and function of some fungal organisms by interfering with the production of substances needed to preserve the cell membrane This drug is effective only for infections caused by fungal organisms It will not work for bacterial or viral infections

incompatibilities.description: The serum concentration of Pretomanid can be increased when it is combined with Tioconazole
The metabolism of Entrectinib can be decreased when combined with Tioconazole
The serum concentration of Lefamulin can be increased when it is combined with Tioconazole
The serum concentration of Colchicine can be increased when it is combined with Tioconazole
The serum concentration of Elexacaftor can be increased when it is combined with Tioconazole
The metabolism of Zanubrutinib can be decreased when combined with Tioconazole
The serum concentration of Voxelotor can be increased when it is combined with Tioconazole
The serum concentration of Levamlodipine can be increased when it is combined with Tioconazole
The serum concentration of Lumateperone can be increased when it is combined with Tioconazole
The serum concentration of Ubrogepant can be increased when it is combined with Tioconazole
The metabolism of Tramadol can be decreased when combined with Tioconazole
The metabolism of Rimegepant can be decreased when combined with Tioconazole
The serum concentration of Haloperidol can be increased when it is combined with Tioconazole
The serum concentration of Selumetinib can be increased when it is combined with Tioconazole
The metabolism of Pemigatinib can be decreased when combined with Tioconazole
The serum concentration of Lurbinectedin can be increased when it is combined with Tioconazole
The serum concentration of Oliceridine can be increased when it is combined with Tioconazole
